ygData.subject: Re: Rant about shadowknights
ygData.msgSnippet: do you know why I picked to be an SK? do you know why I picked human for my race? it was clearly for the challenge, I knew I would be faced with many
ygData.messageBody:
do you know why I picked to be an SK?
do you know why I picked human for my race?

it was clearly for the challenge, I knew I would be faced with many
difficulties, and I didnt want to wander through the game with ease, I
wanted this challenge...and hell, I'm having fun with who I am and what I
am doing, and thats what it should be all about. Have some fun. Kick a
bard's tail every now and then too.

Kael Deathwind
of The Rathe

P.S. oh, you stated that you hated us going anon...well I got a reason why
I am anon...cause when im not anon, all these pathetic paladins keep asking
me where my guild is, like as if I was going to tell them. I got tired of
all the tells, so anon it is for me.

----------
> From: mblackburn@...
> To: eq_shadowknights@onelist.com
> Subject: [eq_shadowknights] Re: Rant about shadowknights
> Date: Friday, April 23, 1999 9:53 PM
>
> From: mblackburn@...
>
> From: "Trevor Smith" <tresmith@...>
> To: <eq_shadowknights@onelist.com>
> Date sent: Fri, 23 Apr 1999 10:57:27 -0500
> Send reply to: eq_shadowknights@onelist.com
> Subject: [eq_shadowknights] Replying to Silkke's comments
(Everyone read this)
>
> I'm a human shadowknight based out of Qeyos, about the only one i can
> see that does not walk around with their "anonymous" flag on. (Baddies
that
> do that, that make themselve anonymous just piss me off. Nothing
personal
> but I figure we need to at least see each other.)
>
> I've just been killed five times in about five minutes. This sucks. I
know it is
> supposed to be hard, difficult, but this almost goes overboard. Getting
my
> corpse took an hour, or I should say getting all of my corpses took an
hour.
> And this is worth it? I get a pet, a crappy harmtouch (I think the math
is
> pretty clear on this) the inability to bash with a dark reaver (my fault
for picking
> a human, but I just don't want to be an ogre/troll/darkelf), some spells
that
> don't look particularly special until I'm 50th level (and for those of
you who think
> that we do get good weapons compared to paladins, the best weapon in the
> game, firey avenger, is paladin only), and the pleasure of being waxed by
any
> inkeeper that comes along. I realize that some of this presents
rolyplaying
> opportunity, but christ, what are the payoffs?
>
> What I'm looking for is a damn pep talk? I'm seriously considering
dumping
> myself and starting over as a paladin just because it has got to have a
better
> payoff. Somebody convince me not to. Please.
>
> Maybe I'll just change races. Maybe I'll quite whining. (I said this
was a rant,
> afterall.) Nah, I probably won't quite whining.
>
> Silkke
> Veeshan (maybe)
>
>
>
>
>
> > This is a multi-part message in MIME format.
> >
> > ------=_NextPart_000_0009_01BE8D78.139CFD00
> > Content-Type: text/plain;
> > charset="iso-8859-1"
> > Content-Transfer-Encoding: quoted-printable
> >
> > Silkke:
> >
> > One of the reasons I decided to go with the Shadow Knight was because
of =
> > the higher level spells. I was checking out GameSpot's EQ guide, they =
> > have a COMPLETE spell list...
> >
> > The Shadow Knight definitely comes into its own at level 30. We get two
=
> > extremely useful spells: Feign Death (just ask any high level monk if =
> > this is useful) and Gather Shadows (invisibility). We also get Heat =
> > Blood (persistent damage), Endure Disease, Resist Cold, Wave of =
> > Enfeeblement, and Voice Graft, which lets you speak through your pet =
> > (hmmm... sounds funny)
> >
> > Level 39 is big also. We get Banshee Aura (damage shield), Cancel Magic
=
> > (stops another caster's spell), Expulse Undead, Heart Flutter (very =
> > cool, does persistent damage AND lowers Strength and AC), Augment
Death, =
> > Infectious Cloud and an extremely useful spell, Intensify Death, which
=
> > we cast on our pet so it regenerates and does more damage.
> >
> > Level 49 is the last rank. We get some powerful spells here too. Invoke
=
> > Fear (causes fear in NPCs and enemies, upgrade of previous versions), =
> > Shadow Sight, Breath of the Dead, Word of Shadows (radius damage), =
> > Dismiss Undead, and what would be my all-time favorite, Boil Blood!
> >
> > Not all these spells had descriptions, I wrote something wherever =
> > possible. Unfortunately no lifetap spells :-( Anyways, I wasn't sure I
=
> > wanted to be an SK until I saw this list. Now I definitely want to be =
> > one. Of course the other hybrids have their upper level spells as well,
=
> > might want to check that out also. Go to www.gamespot.com.
> >
> > One other thing: There are some SK-only weapons, I've heard of one =
> > called the Dark Reaver, I heard there were others too.
> >
> > ------=_NextPart_000_0009_01BE8D78.139CFD00
